thread.title: Pallavi is mad in love with Rohan in ‘Teen Budbak’
thread.title_full: Pallavi is mad in love with Rohan in ‘Teen Budbak’ - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Pallavi is mad in love with Rohan in ‘Teen Budbak’
text:
Bhojpuri actress Pallavi will play a die-hard romantic in her next flick Teen Budbak. The sensational actress will be seen head over heels in love with Rohan in the film. Rakesh Mishra, Raju Singh Mahi and Rohan Singh Rajput will play three down to earth souls who are often called 'budbak'.
Of the three, Rohan plays the love interest of Pallavi who is mad about him. The film is in post-production stage and the actress has recently completed dubbing for the project.
It is to be noted, Pallavi has just seen the release of her other two films Leke Aaja Band Baja Ae Pavan Raja and Vidhayak Ji. While she played a dancing diva in Vidhayak Ji , she was appreciated for her role of actress Khyati's younger sister in Leke Aaja Band Baja Ae Pavan Raja.
 Stay
